attributes.action: actually pay attention to these petitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Basically, we are being ignored. If 2 million British people bother to sign a petition, the least the government can do is acknowledge us. What was the point of creating this website if we just get ignored?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
